advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Barstool Sports - By the Common Man, For The Common Man. A localized sports, pop culture, entertainment hybrid from Boston down to New York and Philly, out to Chicago, and all across every college campus in the nation, it's the largest independently owned men's humor/lifestyle blog in the country. Featuring the best writing personalities on the internet, Barstool is the premiere destination for the funniest blogs, hottest girls, most viral stories and all other up to date digital content. Now ready to be consumed on-the-go on your iPhone.

The Barstool Sports App:
- Easily navigate through all the cities in the Barstool Empire
- Updated in real time as new blogs are published
- Comment on, Like, Tweet, and Share your favorite blogs
releaseNotes:
Few iOS8 compatibility issues fixed.
Black screen fix.
